name: DBL - Mafu Maduro - Box Pressed Toro
additionalNotes: The DBL MAFU Maduro is a flavorful cigar that offers a pleasant array of tasting notes and transitions from foot to nub. The cigar is comprised of an oily and toothy San Andres Maduro wrapper enclosing a Havano Vuelta Abajo binder and Corojo 99 and Pennsylvania Broadleaf long-fillers. The MAFU Maduro Toro is a medium to full bodied smoke featuring flavors of cocoa, cream, spice and a natural tobacco sweetness.Â
